title: Using ArcPy Search Cursors to Perform Spatial Analysis
featured-image-alt: river with ice floating on top. a city skyline behind the river
teaser: A python script was developed to perform iterative spatial analysis based on a jurisdiction boundary dataset.

title: Displaying Last Modified Date for Esri REST Service
teaser: You can get details on publicly shared content in ArcGIS Online using the Fetch API, including last modified date.

title: How to Add A Legend to the Esri Story Map Tour App
teaser: A guide on adding a legend to the Esri Classic StoryMap application, using the ArcGIS JavaScript API.
